section.title: find - search for files in a directory hierarchy
name
section.para: Find every file under directory /usr ending in "stat".

section.title: user
section.para: Find every file under /home and /var/www owned by the user neo.
section.screen: $ find /home -user neo $ find /var/www -user neo $ find . -user nobody -iname '*.php'

section.title: 分别设置文件与目录的权限
section.screen: find /usr/www/phpmyadmin -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; find /usr/www/phpmyadmin -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \;

section.title: -delete
section.para: 保留最近7天的问题，其他全部删除

section.title: exec
section.para: 查找文件中含有openWindow字符串的文件

section.title: xargs
section.screen: find /tmp -name core -type f -print | xargs /bin/rm -f find . -type f -exec file '{}' \;

section.title: 排除目录
section.para: 查找当前目录下的php文件,排除子目录templates_c, caches

section.title: -mmin n File's data was last modified n minutes ago.
-mtime / -mmin
section.para: 查询最近3天前内修改的文件

example.title: backup(find + tar)
example.screen: find / -type f -mtime -7 | xargs tar -rf weekly_incremental.tar gzip weekly_incremental.tar

section.para: 保留7天，删除7天的日志文件
